Thanks for Joining HeadStart!
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for joining HeadStart! We're really excited to have you on the programme, and just wanted to send you a little email saying "what happens next"
In the next two weeks we'll be assigning you to one of your volunteer choices, after this you'll get a call from us confirming your charity and first day of volunteering. You will then get an email with all the details you need and some information on how to get a ticket for our HeadStart Kick Off event.
SAVE THE DATE
HeadStart Kick Off
Saturday 24th October or Monday 26th October
We hope you're really excited for HeadStart, don't forget to check out our Twitter or Facebook for updates and competitions.
CLICK HERE to access the HeadStart Website.
Any questions? Email the HeadStart team, check out our website or get in touch on Twitter or Facebook
The HeadStart team
